title: Travel to US on B1/B2 after being L1 visa holder
question: I worked on L1 visa for 1.5 years in US, quit my job and left back to my country. Now, after 4 month I would like to travel to US for plesure (using my B1/B2 visa). Will I be denied entry? Is there any period of time that I should wait before entering US again for plesure?
answers:
It is usually a case by case situation. You might want to just apply then see what happens.

Good Luck

There is no way to definitively predict the outcome ahead of time, and no definitive period of time.that you can remain abroad to be certain of being permitted back in.

The interviewing officer will look at all of the circumstances in determining the strength of your ties to your country vs any ongoing ties to the U.S. Four months might be enough if you can prove strong ties established to your home country - a job to return to back there, property purchased there, substantial assets there, etc. Eight monthss might not be enough if you don't have these things.
